sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { MdOutlineVpnKey } from 'react-icons/md'
import { StyleSheet, SafeAreaView, Text, View, TextInput } from 'react-native'


const Search = ({ handleSearchNote }) => {
	return (
		<SafeAreaView>
			<View style={styles.key}>
				<MdOutlineVpnKey size='1.8em'/><Text style={styles.text}>Пошук</Text>
			</View>
			<View style={styles.search}>
			<TextInput style={styles.input}
				onChange={(event) =>
					handleSearchNote(event.target.value)
				}
				type='text'
				placeholder='введіть ключ'
				/>
			</View>
		</SafeAreaView>
	);
};

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
	search: {
		textAlign: 'center',
		display: 'grid',
		alignItems: 'center',
		backgroundColor: '#f2f2f2',
		borderRadius: 30,
		border: 'solid',
		color: '#9e5cf6',
		padding: 5,
		margin: 'auto',
		marginBottom: 18,
		width: '50%',
		marginTop: 5,
		height: 50,
		fontSize: 18,
	},
	key: {
		color: '#9e5cf6',
		alignItems: 'center',
		backgroundColor: '#f2f2f2',
		borderRadius: '10',
		margin: 'auto',
		marginTop: '-40',
		display: 'flex',
		flexDirection: 'row',
	},
	text: {
		color: '#9e5cf6',
		marginLeft: '4%',
		marginRight: '4%',
		fontSize: 20,
		fontWeight: 600,
	},
	input: {
		alignItems: 'center',
		textAlign: 'center',
		border: 'none',
		backgroundColor: '#f2f2f2',
		width: '96%',
		marginLeft: '2%',
		marginBottom: 3,
		fontSize: 21,
	},
});

export default Search
